page.title: 01BOULTHAM PARK
page.content: {RECREATION}AREA Former boating lake much used by anglers covers{1.927}hectares. Bandstand(1938), bowling green,tennis court,miniature train used in summer, fitness training course,flower gardens,large greenhouses,putting green(18 holes).Public conveniences. Nearby{church & cemetery.}Access from Newark Rd. via Russell St.,Rookery Lane(x2),St.Peter's Av., Hall Drive & Boultam Park Rd.Pike Drain which runs through the park is crossed by a small bridge.Near the lake,which has an island,are areas of woodland & scrub.There is a children's play area with a sand pit.
